summary:
This mod replace the meshes for the Blades Armor(and NPC) to make it resembles
more Samurai-ish like. Also COMPATIBLE with vanilla or any other Blades Armor texture mod.
descriptionHtml:
=========================
SAMURAI BLADES ARMOR V1
=========================
Sorry for the long update!! recently there\'s too many interesting mod kept me busy playing lol
just added some armor piece for gloves and boots and replace the new helmet mesh..
yeah i know the texture for the helmet is kinda stretchy for now but i will start working on the custom texture soon.

Standalone Version
-Steel Smithing Perk
-MISC category


Also since everyone kept asking this mod is 

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
>>> COMPATIBLE WITH ANY TEXTURE MOD <<< 
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

============
Descriptions
============
Just a remodel works of Blades Armor to make it resembles more Samurai-ish look.
This replace/standalone the Blades Armor in the game - The Blades faction NPC will wore this.
I always feel something was missing from the Blades Outfit in the game so this mod was born =)

If you wish just to download the OLD helmet version check out my Samurai Blades Helmet mod at

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7541

============
Installation
============
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to (install folder) your Skyrim Data folder.
3. Start Skyrim Launcher and play.
4. Get the Blades Armor sets and enjoy your new look.

==============
Uninstallation
==============
Just delete the contents in this folder

   data\\meshes\\armor\\blades\\

===============
Incompatibility
===============
Any mod that changes the mesh of the Blades Armor set.

==========
Known Bugs
==========
still having trouble with slider for now i used type0 copy for type1

==========
Change Log
==========
1.0 Added shinguard, armguard and new helmet mesh
0.3 Fixed paint skinweight/clipping issues
0.2 Included Samurai Blades Mod v1.2 to this files
0.1 Added Blades Armor mod for type_0 character

=======
Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for making the Skyrim
Thanks to Nexus to motivate me making this mod
Thanks to somuchmonster for his tutorial

Hope you guys like it!
~Fuwada Zyuu
author: Zyuu Fuwada
